snippet: Listed on exchanges and traded like securities, energy M.L.P.s give average investors a way to tap the profits created by the U.S. energy boom.
lead_paragraph: Listed on exchanges and traded like securities, energy M.L.P.s give average investors a way to tap the profits created by the U.S. energy boom.

headline.main: With Master Limited Partnerships, Get a Piece of the Pipeline
headline.print_headline: With Master Limited Partnerships, Get a Piece of the Pipeline
